revised_title: A Description of Curious Books and Artifacts from the Journal des Scavans
tldr: The article describes a collection of rare and curious books and artifacts from the Journal des Scavans, including works on aquatics, art, weapons, medals, and gods of the ancients. It also discusses the author's method of dissecting the brain and injecting various substances to study the functions of the soul and animal motions.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Library and Museum Collections
